p: Forty-seven other relevant journals publishing IS articles were suggested by 31 experts, referring to various fields of research (e.g., public health, mental health, or psychology) ( Table 2). Most suggested journals oriented primarily toward clinicians in a particular field, such as internal medicine or mental health, but that publish implementation-relevant work. These journals included, for example, the American Journal of Public Health, the Journal of General Internal Medicine, and Psychiatric Services.
